title: Defines minimalism and simplicity
comment: Coupled with GMD gesture control, it's awesome.  Someone suggested having some gestures by default, that is an costly event in terms of ram (compared to pure this). I say make a sticky notification to launch the stock app drawer instead

title: Maybe a little too simple
comment: For what it's worth, it's wonderful but if you're trying to keep memory on low this isn't it. Since launching apps from it isn't possible, I was stuck with apps that needs to always be running so I either get a cluttered notification bar or apps closing for lack of memory. For someone who frequently multitask, that's a problem.  EDIT: Works well with home screen launcher in my tablet which has a navbar, but not too well with my phone.

comment: Null Launcher + Bar Launcher (or similar) + Organized Drawer = Fast phone. I love this launcher!
Just what I need, thanks Dev :D
Thank you ! I've always wanted a launcher like this

title: 1 word
comment: Godly

title: like this
comment: I like this launcher! Love it!

title: Number one
comment: Best way to keep your home screen clean and the resource usage low. Very useful when combined with alternative launchers (Home Button Launcher, SwipePad, etc.). What I would like to see is an option for portrait wallpaper and for disabling the zoom launcher choise menu but whatever.

title: Works great
comment: 0 kb on my built in task man.. paired it with smart taskbar.

title: Excellent...But
comment: This launcher works great and serves its purpose well, the only issue I have is that every time I unlock my phone it defaults to the task switching screen. If this is fixed, it will be flawless.

title: No need for a launcher!
comment: Use this app with swipe pad for a pure gesture experience!

title: 1 word.
comment: Awesome.

Does what it says, but it would be nice to have some options. Hitting the menu button does nothing. I'd like to be able to hide the notification panel entirely. Not only this, but my device supports a transparent notification panel and it doesn't work in this app. Also holding the menu key to perform a Google search stops working I'm this launcher.

title: Useful for some.
comment: Useful for testing the launcher switching actions etc and might be useful for some users but I find myself missing Widgets.  Might be nice to have the option to put say 1 or 2 Widgets on it. Works great with sao launcher.

title: Love it
comment: Pair this up with swapps or another app switching app and it is perfect. Clean and simplistic

comment: Great idea.

title: Absolutely Perfect
comment: WORKS EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED!!! One of the few apps that does what it suppose to. One of the best minimalist launchers. For those wanting features, stop writing bad reviews and go find a different launcher. The only issue I had was upon initial run it was glitchy and slow to respond, but after that it was smooth as silk. Thank you for a wonderful app, keep up the great work.

title: Stable
comment: Its a very stable launcher.

title: Excellent
comment: It sounds like a pointless app but it is really good, cool and useful!!!

title: Great
comment: I use it as a backup launcher to play with live wallpapers.

title: +4, I love it!
comment: +1 for simplicity +1 for saving my battery +2 for open source! Love the launcher!

title: Well.....
comment: It does what it says,  and seems to do it well.  Giving it a four star rating,  but uninstalling,  it's just not useful enough to me. Good idea,  but needs some extra features.  Needs to be able to hide top notification bar,  and needs to be able to swipe up to show dock.  If it had those features it would be a five star app and I would keep it. I definitely recommend that u try it out,  some ppl would really love this app,  it's just not for me.

title: Just what I need!!!
comment: Best launcher ever!!!! It does nothing, exactly what I need so it doesn't interfere with slide launcher+ home button launcher + SWAPPS.  I found the use of an all in one launcher kinda frustrating to use with the nvidia shield and its tiny screen. Just replace them with hotkey like shortcuts and your good to go.

title: It stopped working :-(
comment: It used to work but stopped working now.

title: useful
comment: The only issue I've had with Null launcher is it seems to lower the resolution of my wallpaper, thus, making it blurry and ugly. If I apply wallpapers under any other launcher they are fine. Soon as I select Null launcher as my default, my wallpaper immediately zooms in and pixelates. Kinda annoying :/ Samsung Galaxy Centura,   ICS 4.0.4,   320x480@160dpi         ::side-note:: I do admit, being able to add a widget/shortcut to the single home-screen would be pretty useful and enjoyable. But any more than that would be counteractive.

title: Unique concept
comment: Its a unique concept...loved it as it hided my dock;-)...using it with LMT and Ultimate faves pro But i would liked it more if it has widget option..:-) If you can add that option:-)

title: Minimalist
comment: Fast and smooth. Feels like another type of operating system.

title: Nice
comment: It's very nice combine with swapps. Anyway, how to add a widget? It is possible? Thanks

comment: For those who rate it 2 stars because you want a function that is *not* the purpose nor within the scope of this app - YOU ARE AN UNGRATEFUL FREELOADER!
